name: Champion Of Horse Jumping Show
description:
It is an exciting game especially designed for horse jumping &racing lovers. Keep controlling your horse and crossing all the hurdles. Focus on your speed. Its astonishing features, 3D graphics and amazing sounds will make it an addictive gameplay. It will give you an amazing horse racing experience.


Champion Of Horse Jumping Show: Features

Realistic Environment.
Easy and smooth controls
Beautiful Horses
Horse Sound Effects
Real like horse physics
Challenging levels
